org.openimaj.video.processing.tracking

Class BasicMBFImageObjectTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.video.processing.tracking.BasicMBFImageObjectTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObjectTracker<org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.Rectangle,MBFImage>

    public class BasicMBFImageObjectTracker
extends Object
implements ObjectTracker<org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.Rectangle,MBFImage>
    A tracker that will track one rectangular region using the KLTTracker from MBFImages. It simply uses the BasicObjectTracker and flattens the incoming MBFImages to FImages and then tracks.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

        public List<org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.Rectangle> initialiseTracking(org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.Rectangle bounds,
                                                                  MBFImage image)
        Initialise the tracking with the given target area in the given image.
        Specified by:
        initialiseTracking in interface ObjectTracker<org.openimaj.math.geometry.shape.Rectangle,MBFImage>
        Parameters:
        bounds - The target area to track in the image
        image - The image to initialise the tracking with
        Returns:
        A list of found objects (may be empty if no object found); should not be null.
